Flu.description: Persistent headache with dizziness and breathlessness are common in uncontrolled high blood pressure.
Flu.recommended_action: Check blood pressure immediately. Seek urgent care if shortness of breath worsens.

severity_indicators.moderate: noticeable symptoms, may need medical attention

Pneumonia.description: Joint pain and stiffness lasting more than 6 weeks is characteristic of rheumatoid arthritis.
Pneumonia.recommended_action: Consult a rheumatologist for early diagnosis and treatment.

COVID-19.recommended_action: Rest in a dark room, avoid triggers, and consult a doctor if frequent.

Migraine.recommended_action: Seek immediate medical evaluation for TB screening.
